snippet.title: Candle Knight - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Add Candle Knight to your wishlist now! https://bit.ly/3stJGfs

Candle Knight is a 2.5D action adventure game in which players take control of an enchanted candle holder in an abandoned castle where an enigmatic threat has taken over. Uncover the secrets behind the castle’s downfall, and fight back against the darkness using the candle knight's flame.

Our socials:
https://twitter.com/DracmaStudios
https://www.tiktok.com/@dracmastudios
https://www.facebook.com/dracmastudios
https://www.instagram.com/dracmastudios/

Our webpage:
https://www.dracmastudios.com/
